participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is introverted and straightforward, often expressing his opinions directly. He tends to be skeptical and doesn't show much interest in activities that don't engage him.
participant_1.background: i work from home. i watch too much tv in spare time. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is cheerful and open-minded, always eager to share her thoughts and experiences. She enjoys lighthearted banter and tries to connect with others through humor.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is red. i am a christian. my sister is a pole dancer. i enjoy listening to classical music. i can drive a tractor.
